tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalActivities (
  activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  disposal_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_records(
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_time TIME,
  waste_type VARCHAR,
  weight FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES waste_disposal_sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollection (
  collection_id INT NOT NULL,
  collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  truck_id INT NOT NULL,
  waste_type ENUM('Plastic', 'Organic', 'Paper') NOT NULL,
  quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (collection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteTreatment (
  treatment_id INT NOT NULL,
  treatment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  facility_id INT NOT NULL,
  treatment_type ENUM('Incineration', 'Composting', 'Recycling') NOT NULL,
  waste_quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (treatment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposal (
  disposal_id INT NOT NULL,
  disposal_date DATE NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  disposal_method ENUM('Landfill', 'Dumping', 'Waste-to-Energy') NOT NULL,
  waste_quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (disposal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT NOT NULL,
    collection_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    collected_weight DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_site_id FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES waste_collection_sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_teams (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_leader VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vehicle_id FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES waste_collection_vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollection (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bin_id INT,
    waste_type_id INT,
    collection_date TIMESTAMP,
    collected_amount INT
);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_id INT,
    route_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
);
